pullrequest.title: Make sure gzserver destroys all callbacks when gzclient exits

content.raw:
Can you explain the reason for making this into a shared pointer? Will its ownership be shared with others?

Since `gui::DataLogger` inherits from `QDialog` and we give it a parent, we should be safe to assume Qt will take care of its lifetime. I believe that's why we were originally keeping just a raw pointer to it.
